data.title: Sidewalk Film Center & Cinema
data.text:
Wild at Heart

A wild crazy love story.

David Lynch

Join Sidewalk for our new monthly auteur director series! February will feature David Lynch and will include the titles Blue Velvet, Lost Highway, Wild at Heart, and Mulholland Drive as well as a special Midnight Madness screening of Eraserhead, a free Twin Peaks VHS Night, and the critical essay film Lynch/Oz.

Film Synopsis: After serving prison time for a self-defense killing, Sailor Ripley reunites with girlfriend Lula Fortune. Lula’s mother, Marietta, desperate to keep them apart, hires a hitman to kill Sailor. But he finds a whole new set of troubles when he and Bobby Peru, an old buddy who’s also out to get Sailor, try to rob a store. When Sailor lands in jail yet again, the young lovers appear further than ever from the shared life they covet.

Take advantage of the Sidewalk Early Bird Special on Thursday afternoon screenings before 5pm. $5 Tickets, free coffee, on-screen captions (when provided by distributors), and reduced theatre capacity.

Credits

Director(s):

David Lynch

Producer(s):

Sigurjón Sighvatsson

Cast:

Nicolas Cage, Laura Dern, Willem Dafoe, J.E. Freeman, Crispin Glover, Diane Ladd

Composer(s):

Angelo Badalamenti

Choreographer(s):

Kimberley Vashiell
